text: Richard Alan Zimmer (born August 16, 1944) is an American Republican Party politician and lawyer. He was a member of the United States House of Representatives for New Jersey's 12th congressional district from 1991 until 1997. He was the Republican nominee for the U.S. Senatein 1996 and 2008. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:State legislators of the United States Category:United States representatives from New Jersey Category:Politicians from Newark, New Jersey Category:Businesspeople from Newark, New Jersey Category:Lawyers from Newark, New Jersey Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Dick Zimmer
